metadata.name: The end of kings
metadata.description:
This collection is executed in an exquisite style
A style of digital and miniature painting, original Iranian art
This collection contains ancient and unseen images of human civilization thousands of years ago
No one has thought of the end of kings
We started this series with Pharaoh
This collection will continue
Stay with us

size of paint is 6000*4000 pixel 
and we will send a free motion version for first collector
